meanings.sent1: After the wind blew it down, she is rehanging the picture on the wall.
meanings.sent2: He rehangs the curtains every spring to let more light in.
meanings.sent3: The rehanging of the hammock turned into a fun game of tug-of-war with the dog.
meanings.sent4: The artist rehanging her paintings on the gallery walls symbolized a fresh start.
meanings.sent5: The rehanging of the chandelier made the room sparkle with new light.

meanings.definition: The act of hanging something again.
meanings.sent1: The rehanging of the banner was necessary after it fell during the storm.
meanings.sent2: She noticed the rehanging of the family photos in a different order.
meanings.sent3: The rehanging of the bird feeder attracted even more feathered visitors.
meanings.sent4: The rehanging of the curtains transformed the room into a cozy retreat.
meanings.sent5: The rehanging of the sign outside the shop drew attention to the new opening hours.
